name: dangunland-mud-client
description: Web-based MUD client for DangunLand with retro 80s computer aesthetic

scripts.dev: concurrently "npm --workspace backend run dev" "npm --workspace frontend-react run dev"
scripts.dev:electron: npm run build:electron && npm --workspace electron-app run dev
scripts.clean: npm --workspace frontend-react run clean && npm --workspace electron-app run clean
scripts.rebuild: npm run clean && npm run build && npm run build:electron
scripts.install-all: npm install && npm --workspace backend install && npm --workspace frontend-react install && npm --workspace electron-app install

author: khunny7
